Releasing funds only as the team hits clearly defined prototype, consumer-test, and pre-order milestones ensures focus and accountability—and if they falter, we can reallocate remaining dollars to the steadier, lower-risk industrial R&D to shore up margins.
second_reasoning: We commit the full twenty million to the Consumer Products Division under the agreed three-stage gate framework because it offers the greatest opportunity to reverse its earnings decline with a single breakout innovation.
